Description:
Detects the deletion of IIS WebServer access logs which may indicate an attempt to destroy forensic evidence

Author: Tim Rauch (Nextron Systems), Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: IIS WebServer Access Logs Deleted
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where filepath like '%\inetpub\logs\logfiles\%' and filepath like '%.log'
